text: qil -'ayaha alrasula- lihula' almushrikina: hatuu shuhada'akum aladhin yashhadun 'ana allah taealaa hu aladhi hrram ma hrramtm min alharth wal'aneami, fa'iin shahiduu -kdhbana wzwrana- fala tusadiqhum, wala tawafuq aldhyn hkkamu 'ahwa'ahuma, fakadhabuu biayat allah fima dhahabuu 'iilayh min tahrim ma 'ahala allaha, watahlil ma haram allaha, wala tatabie aladhin la yusadiqun bialhayat alakhirat wala yaemalun laha, waladhin hum birabihim yushrikun fayaebudun maeah ghayrah
